name: Deployment Exporter
description: Generates the POM, FED, script files needed to run the experiment

configStructure.name: exportVersion
configStructure.description: The version of the model to be exported

configStructure.name: isRelease
configStructure.description: Is the model a release version?

configStructure.name: groupId
configStructure.description: The group ID to be included in the Maven POMs

configStructure.name: cpswtVersion
configStructure.description: The version of the C2W foundation to be used

configStructure.name: repositoryUrlSnapshot
configStructure.description: The URL of the repository where the packaged components should be deployed.

configStructure.name: repositoryUrlRelease
configStructure.description: The URL of the repository where the packaged components should be deployed.

configStructure.name: bindAddress
configStructure.description: Bind Address to associate for the Federation
